title: Spike Feresten!
description: Once again Spike Feresten joins us in the studio; this time to promote his new podcast Spike Feresten's Car Radio.  As is tradition when Spike is around Porsche gets lots of air time which in this case coincided with our preview earlier in the day of Forza 7 which debuted the new 991 GT2 RS. Additionally Matt and Zack share grid life stories and somehow we end up back on watches.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
